title: What happens if you put too much laundry detergent in the washer? - Quora

response.answer_text: It might cause so much suds that machine begins to leak past its gaskets. More likely, the clothes will not be sufficiently rinsed. If so, your clothes might feel itchy, or you might have an allergic reaction. If none of the above happens, the excess soap could, also, buildup in some of the mechanical parts. That could lead to breakdowns of the machines. Good luck!
